item.title: Kafka Quickstart
item.description: Apache Kafka is a framework implementation of a software bus using stream processing.

item.title: NGINX
item.description: These next steps provide an ideal place to start deploying and running your first application on Kubernetes.

item.title: RabbitMQ
item.description: Robust messaging for applications to connect and scale. RabbitMQ is an open-source message broker software that implements the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP).

item.title: Shiny R
item.description: Shiny is an R package that makes it easy to build interactive web apps straight from R.
